full_summary:
## W6399-24EC09 Multi-Purpose Data Software Request for Proposal

**Reference Number: WS4296639781-Doc4298411517**
**Publication Date: 2023-11-09**
**Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-17T14:00:00 (EST)**

### Request Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide various types of tools and support. The requirements specify the need for technologically advanced/leading edge capabilities, with the supplier providing innovative solutions incorporating leading edge technologies against Supply Arrangement # W6399-22CA50.

### Eligibility

Only those suppliers who are current holders of Supply Arrangement # W6399-22CA50 have been emailed this Request for Proposal (RFP). Interested bidders must qualify for Supply Arrangement W6399-22CA50 before being given an opportunity to bid on this requirement. 

Please note that Canada will not extend RFP # W6399-24EC09 to provide additional time for bidders to qualify for the Supply Arrangement and submit a proposal for this RFP. The RFP and relevant documentation are available on the CanadaBuys website.

### Tender Notice Details

* **United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC):** Electronic and communication measuring and testing instruments, Computer Equipment and Accessories, Software, Electronic software reference material, Software or hardware engineering, Software maintenance and support, Computer software licensing rental or leasing service, Software application administration service.
* **Trade Agreements:** WTO GPA, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement. 
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except NCR)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:** Malko-Moore, Shamael (SPAC/PSPC) (elle-la / she-her),  shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
